DESCRIPTION: Give a card to the mentioned user
SLASH_DESC: Enter the user you want to give that card to
SLASH_DESC2: Enter the code of the card that you want to give away
NO_SELF_GIVE: {{author}}, you cannot give a card to yourself
NO_CODE: {{author}}, you forgot to provide the card code
NO_CARD_FOUND: Cannot find any card with the code: `{{code}}`
CARD_LOCKED: That card is locked and cannot be given away! Untag the card to proceed
CARD_NOT_OWNED: You do not own that card anymore
